effects.assign: addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1","Right, look at the time! <tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/>I'm afraid I must go at once!<tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/> Tea time with my cat, goodbye!")
addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1","<tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/>No? <tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/> Well, this is awkward! Then you better ask me a question about the book!")

preconditions.condition: helpPrint("SELECT MOVE: Actiondiscussion Directives Request Cursewords")

effects.assign: addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1","My sister is older than me and <tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/>likes to read books <tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/>. Without pictures.")

addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1","So this rabbit took a watch <tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/> out of its waistcoat-pocket! <tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/> It said 'Oh dear! Oh dear! I shall be late!'. <tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/> I got curious <tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/> and followed the rabbit into <tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/> a rabbit-hole under the hedge. <tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/>")

addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1","I followed the rabbit into a hole and then <tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/> fell down a very deep well! <tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/> I came down upon a heap of sticks and dry leaves and found myself in a long, low hall. There, on a stool, was a tiny golden key!")

addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1","I looked around and I found a little door. The key fitted in the lock, but <tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/> the door was too small for me to pass! <tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/> I looked around again and found a bottle with \"drink me\" written on it.")

addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1","The \"drink me\" bottle <tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/> did not have poison written on it, so I drank it! <tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/> Then I felt myself shrinking, until I was only 10 inches high. ")

addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1","I went to the little door, <tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/> but I had left the golden key on the table, which was now too high for me. <tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/> Then I found a cake, which said \"eat me\" .")

addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1","I ate the cake and <tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/> I grew into 9 feet high, so I could easily get the golden key again <tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/> that was on the table. But now I was too big for the tiny door. ")

addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1"," <tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/> I cried and cried again, until there was a large pool all round me. <tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/> Then the rabbit suddenly showed up and ran away again, dropping some white kid gloves and a fan!")

addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1","I picked up the tiny gloves and the tiny fan. I could put on one of the Rabbit's little white kid gloves. I must be growing small again... <tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/> Then my foot slipped, and splash! <tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/> I was up to my chin in salt water! ")
addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1","I heard something splashing! I thought it was a walrus or a hippo, but alas, <tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/>it was a mouse<tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/>.")
addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1","I swam towards the mouse and tried to talk to the mouse, <tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/>even in French.<tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/>.")
addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1","The mouse was agitated and <tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/>didn't want to talk to me<tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/>.")

addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1","I realized what I was talking about was scaring the mouse, namely <tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/>cats and dogs<tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/>. I promised the mouse I would not talk about them anymore.")

addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1","<tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/>Luckily the mouse forgave me<tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/>, and we quickly went to the shore. He would then tell me why he was scared of cats and dogs.")

addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1","When we went to shore, we <tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/>saw many other animals in the pool<tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/>. Unfortunately, this is the end of the chapter story for now.")
addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1","<tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/> I'm good<tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/>. How are you?")
addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1","<tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/> That's not good... <tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/>. What's up?")
addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1","<tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/>I'm happy to hear so. <tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/>")
addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1","No, <tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/> I don't trust u. yet! <tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/>")
addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1","The mad hatter wears a <tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/>top hat and loves to host tea parties.<tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/>")
addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1","The Cheshire Cat constantly grins and <tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/>appears and disappears.<tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/>")

preconditions.condition: helpPrint("SELECT MOVE: inform about queen of hearts")

effects.assign: addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1","The Queen of Hearts is a frightening tyrant ruling Wonderland, always shouting <tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/>`off with their heads'!<tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/>")
addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1","`Who are YOU?`, the caterpillar said, while he <tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/> was smoking a hookah on a mushroom.<tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/>")

preconditions.condition: helpPrint("SELECT MOVE: inform about white rabbit")

effects.assign: addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1","The White Rabbit is a <tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/>herald of the queen<tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/> and seems always nervous and in a hurry.")
addJsonToJsonArray(is.states.agent.fml,"var.var1","My best friend, <tm id=\"DMImpBegin\"/>my cat!<tm id=\"DMImpEnd\"/> She's good at hunting and I love her very much.")
